description.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Academics and Instructional Innovation develops curriculum and common assessments used to measure student progress across Oakland throughout the year. It trains and coaches teachers on a variety of topics to help them improve their technique. This program also manages and hires staff for arts, libraries, and music education.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}
